MappingFields.Name: employeeId
MappingFields.Description:
[Mandatory]
Please rename the field to the correlation field used in the dependent system. 
Most likely the built-in Microsoft Active Directory target system.

MappingFields.Name: SamAccountName
MappingFields.Description: Required for foldername. If using different attribute for foldername, change the name to the corresponding AD attribute and place correct attribute name in permission scripts.
